body:
Yes, a user can address this by setting the DASK_CONFIG variable.  This is
additional to that, in hopes that it maybe helps users get to a solution
faster if they're unfamiliar with setting environment variable.

On Wed, Sep 27, 2023 at 10:10 AM James Bourbeau ***@***.***>
wrote:

> ***@***.**** commented on this pull request.
>
> Thanks @mrocklin <https://github.com/mrocklin>
>
> Isn't this type of problem what the DASK_CONFIG environment variable is
> for? I don't care that much about the proposed change here, though it does
> seem like it's adding extra code for a case we already support (maybe I'm
> missing something though)
>
> We should add a bullet point for this new place configuration files can
> live in https://docs.dask.org/en/stable/configuration.html
>
> —
